definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: People who have vitiligo are sensitive to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 人谁也白癜风是敏感的太阳。

sentences.english: We think that the vitiligo in the family history is caused by autosomal dominant inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 作者认为该家系的白癜风为常染色体显性遗传。

sentences.english: The relationship between vitiligo and congenital melanocytic nevus needs to be further elucidated.
sentences.chinese: 白癜风合并先天性色素痣这一现象值得进一步研究。

sentences.english: A case of alopecia areata associated with vitiligo and DLE is reported.
sentences.chinese: 报告1例斑秃伴白癜风和盘状红斑狼疮。

sentences.english: The relationship between vitiligo and congenital nevus needs to be further elucidated.
sentences.chinese: 白癜风合并先天性色素痣这一现象值得进一步研究。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficiency of spiring capsule to treat patients with vitiligo vulgaris.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察螺旋藻胶囊治疗寻常型白癜风的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect and significance of mycobacterium phlei F.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察乌体林斯注射液治疗白癜风的临床疗效。

sentences.english: People with dark skin may observe the onset of vitiligo at any time.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤黝黑的人可能会发现在任何时候白癜风的发病。

sentences.english: Vitiligo is associated with the function loss of epidermal melanocytes.
sentences.chinese: 白癜风由于表皮黑素细胞的功能丧失而引起。

sentences.english: Psoralen is the most effective herb for the treatment of vitiligo.
sentences.chinese: 补骨脂是最有效的治疗白癜风的植物。

sentences.english: For the treatment of generalized vitiligo, phototherapy has excellent efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 对于泛发的白癜风，光疗有良好的效果。

sentences.english: Its development is affected by genetic and environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 白癜风的发生受遗传与环境因素的共同影响。

sentences.english: Its use with tamarind is very beneficial for the cure of Vitiligo.
sentences.chinese: 它和罗望子一起使用对于白癜风的治疗十分的有益。

sentences.english: Its use with Psoralen is beneficial as a home remedy of vitiligo.
sentences.chinese: 将它和补骨脂使用是有益于家庭治疗白癜风的。

sentences.english: Jackson had vitiligo, a skin-blotching condition.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊有白癜风，皮肤上有大面积的范围。

sentences.english: Objective: To prove curative effect and safety of Weialu that was applied to cure vitiligo.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨维阿露治疗白癜风的疗效和安全性。

definition: pityriasis versicolor (aka tinea versicolor), blotchy skin condition common in tropical areas, common name 汗斑
common name for 花斑癣, tinea versicolor

pinyin: qiang2 zhi2 xing4 ji3 zhu4 yan2
